articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the State Merited Chorus at the April 25 House of Culture here on Wednesday, the 80th anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, enjoyed the performance.
					
					 He sent congratulations to the servicepersons on the 80th anniversary of the founding of the KPA, acknowledging the enthusiastically cheering audience.
					
					 Seeing the performance were senior party, state and army officials Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Bom Gi, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam and Jo Yon Jun, the chairman of the friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials in the fields of science, education, literature and art, public health and media and officers and men of the KPA and the Korean Internal Security Forces.
					
					 Invited there were overseas compatriots' delegations and overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys, members of the military attache corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 Among the numbers of the performance that began with the national anthem were male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army", male chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", mixed duet "The Country I Am Defending", a series of male chorus "Motherland Calls You", "The Victorious Parade" and male chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives".
					
					 The performers sang highly of the undying revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who provided powerful military capabilities that guarantee the prosperity of the country and well-being of all the generations to come.
					
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the performers and audience and appreciated the performance.
					
					 Greatly satisfied with the excellent performance, he expressed hope and conviction that the creators and artistes of the State Merited Chorus would greatly encourage the army and people to vigorously advance toward the final victory through their revolutionary and militant performing activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Attends Opening Ceremony of Meat and Fish Shop
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Attends Opening Ceremony of Meat and Fish Shop
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Mansugyo Meat and Fish Shop built on the bank of picturesque Pothong River in Pyongyang started its business on Wednesday.
					 The 3-storey shop covers 5 000 plus square meters.
					
					 Its ground floor has counters of fresh and frozen fish and processed fish while the first floor counters of meat including beef, pork, goose, turkey and quail and processed foodstuff.
					
					 The second floor has a restaurant serving steak.
					
					 The opening ceremony was held on Wednesday.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un appeared at the shop to congratulate its opening.
					
					 Attended there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials and officials concerned.
					
					 Looking round the interior of the shop, Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction with the solider builders having built the shop to be loved by the people.
					
					 He ardently said leader Kim Jong Il would have seen the shop with the highest service level.
					
					 He advanced tasks to manage and operate the shop.
					
					 He visited the shop construction site in January and indicated the orientation and ways for construction, underlining the need to provide the best convenience to the consumers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Builders of Exhibition of Arms
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Builders of Exhibition of Arms
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with soldier-builders who successfully built the Exhibition of Arms and Equipment of the KPA as a monumental edifice in the era of Songun on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Jong Un waved back to the soldier-builders enthusiastically cheering him, overcome with excitement, and extended a warm salute to them. 
					
					 He warmly congratulated them and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 He repeatedly praised them for their laudable exploits, noting that they successfully built the exhibition as a gift to leader Kim Jong Il, greatly contributing to adding shine to the Songun revolutionary exploits performed by the great persons of Mt. Paektu, helping the service personnel of the KPA and people deeply grasp the history of the army of the WPK and thus encouraging them in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed belief that the solider-builders would make a positive contribution to the cause of building a thriving nation by fully displaying patriotic devotion and popular heroism in the defence of the country and socialist construction in the future, too. 
					
					 Present at the photo session were senior officials of party and armed forces organs Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Choe Pu Il, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Kim Su Hak and Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Sierra Leone
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Ernest Bai Koroma, president of Sierra Leone, on the occasion of its 51st independence day.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president and his people greater success in their efforts for national unity and economic development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of South Africa
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma, president of South Africa, on the occasion of the Freedom Day, its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good friendly bonds between the DPRK and South Africa would grow stronger and wished the president and people of South Africa greater success in their efforts for national unity and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Togo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Togo
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, president of Togo, on the occasion of its 52nd independence day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Togo would grow stronger in various fields and wished the president and people of Togo great success in their efforts for national reconciliation and unity and socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Credentials from Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials from Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador after receiving his credentials.

articles.title: Pomminryon Representatives Meeting Held
articles.content:
Pomminryon Representatives Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) Wednesday issued the following joint press release on the meeting of representatives of its north, the south and overseas sides: 
					 The meeting of representatives of the north, the south and overseas sides of Pomminryon was held in Pyongyang on April 25.
					
					 Present there from the North Headquarters of Pomminryon was its Chairman Choe Jin Su, from the South Headquarters of Pomminryon its Acting-chairman Ro Su Hui and from Overseas Headquarters of Pomminryon its Chairman Rim Min Sik. 
					
					 The meeting held against the background of the extremely complicated and tense situation at home and abroad was unanimous in stressing that the only way of achieving peace and independent reunification of the country is to firmly preserve and implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Pomminryon expressed its firm will to take the lead in implementing the north-south joint declaration, boost the solidarity among the north, the south and overseas sides and decisively increase Pomminryon through its initiative and positive activities for independent reunification.
					
					 It also underscored the need to boost solidarity with people from all walks life at home and abroad including the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration, put strong spurs to the nation-wide movement for implementing the declarations, judge the anti-reunification conservative forces at any cost this year by dint of unity and ensure that the trend of the June 15 era be given continuity.
					
					 It also stressed the need to remove all kinds of obstacles lying in the way of national reconciliation and unity including the "Security Law" and "May 24 steps", called on the south side to struggle to get the unreasonably arrested pro-reunification persons released and conduct dynamic actions to have the freedom of discussion on reunification and activities for it guaranteed. 
					
					 The representatives of the north and overseas sides reiterated their firm stand to fully support and encourage the South Headquarters taking the lead in the actions to boldly shatter the anti-reunification forces' vicious moves against the South Headquarters and achieve the independence, peace and great unity of the nation.
					
					 The meeting vehemently denounced the Lee Myung Bak conservative forces for their vicious provocative acts of seriously hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and pushing the situation to the brink of a war and called upon all the compatriots at home and abroad to turn out as one in the nation-wide struggle against them.
					
					 The representatives of the north, the south and overseas sides expressed the strong will and determination of Pomminryon to play a pioneer role in weathering the prevailing grave situation, protecting the security of the compatriots and making a decisive breakthrough in the efforts for independent reunification.

articles.title: People's Security Ministry Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
People's Security Ministry Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) --  A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security headed by Councilor and Department Director Ri Song Chol left here Thursday to visit China.
					 The delegation of the Chinese People's Association for Peace and Disarmament led by its Vice-President Li Wuwei, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, left here for home on Thursday.

articles.title: More Rallies Take Place to Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
articles.content:
More Rallies Take Place to Vow to Wipe Out Rat-like Lee Group
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people in South Hwanghae and Ryanggang provinces and Nampho City of the DPRK met on Thursday to vow to wipe out the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of bastards without equals in the world.
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people of different social standings and youth and students in the provinces and city.
					
					 The statement issued by a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers called for wiping out the rat-like Myung Bak group to the last man as it again dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK dearer than their own lives, not content with committing the thrice-cursed high treason during the period of mourning the great loss to the nation. 
					
					 Intolerable are the crimes rat-like Lee committed by setting in motion aged reactionaries no better than paupers, gangster-like students and ultra-right conservative media persons to recklessly shake their fists towards the Heaven, they declared, and went on: 
					
					 Lee going reckless, not fearful of Heaven, exactly looks like an underwit and a rat. 
					
					 It is the invariable will and mode of retaliation of the army and people of the DPRK to react to any provocation with strong punishment and to a war with a merciless retaliatory sacred war. 
					
					 No matter how desperately rats may squeak and no matter how noisily rabid dogs may bark, they can never hurt the sun. The army of Mt. Paektu which shows no mercy will search every hole crowded with groups of rats going desperate and kill them with sharp bayonets. 
					
					 Then followed protest demonstrations.

articles.title: Korean People Vow Vengeance on Rat-like Lee Group
articles.content:
Korean People Vow Vengeance on Rat-like Lee Group
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now trembling with surging indignation at the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats who dared defame the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Echoing everywhere in the country are shouts, "Tear the rat-like Myung Bak to pieces", "Reduce the den of rats to ashes" and "Give us an order of action". 
					
					 The shouts represent the people's minds seized with anger at the Lee swarm of rats, who dared call for an "attack on the supreme headquarters through the office window" in the wake of its high treason of hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership. 
					
					 Saying he can hardly hold in check himself, Ji Song Ho, a student of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 "I am a discharged soldier. My mind is always in the frontline military post, though my body is in Pyongyang.
					
					 I am ready to join my former fellow soldiers to destroy the den of the rat-like Lee group."
					
					 Jong Un Sol (50), a Pyongyang citizen, said:
					
					 "I feel shuddered to think that rat-like Lee Myung Bak, who is more dead than alive, is still squeaking in broad daylight. I am eager to eradicate the stinky rats on this land at an early date."
					
					 Choe Ju Song, a worker at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said:
					
					 "All workers of my workshop petitioned to be allowed to rejoin the army. We are resolved not to return home before we beat the group of rats to a pulp and reunify the country."

articles.title: Bean Milk Powder Shop Goes Operational
articles.content:
Bean Milk Powder Production Process Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A modern bean milk powder production process was established at the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory.
					 Employees of the factory, soldier-builders and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology manufactured dozens of equipment needed for automatic packing process and the process of carrying and melting sugar powder and installed latest equipment.
					
					 Its inaugural ceremony took place on Thursday.

articles.title: Sanitary Articles Shop Goes Operational
articles.content:
Sanitary Articles Shop Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A process for producing sanitary articles with big capacity was completed at the Pyongyang Cigarette Paper Factory.
					 The completion of this process made it possible to more satisfactorily meet women's requirement for daily necessaries.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony was held at the factory on Thursday. 
					
					 Present there were Mun Kyong Dok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Complex Completed
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Complex Completed
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Taekwon-Do Complex was built in Chongchun Street of Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Complex covers a total floor space of more than ten thousand square meters.
					
					 It is a present to the 100th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's birth.
					
					On display at its Taekwon-Do history museum are historical documents and photos on data showing the birth and development of Taekwon-Do, a traditional martial art of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Complex has training rooms equipped with various kinds of training instruments and a big hall in the heart of it where Taekwon-Do players can practice their technique.
					
					 There are also computer-based knowledge dissemination room, conference room, video room and various welfare service facilities.
					
					 Pak Hyok, manager of the Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 "The Complex is for the study of the history and science of Taekwon-Do and dissemination of its technique and for training of its players and instructors.
					
					 It will greatly contribute to further developing Taekwon-Do and displaying the Korean nation's superiority."

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Marked at DPRK Embassy in Russia
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Marked at DPRK Embassy in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the DPRK embassy in Moscow to celebrate the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the Ministry of Defence, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Communist Party of the Russian Federation, Liberal Democratic Party, Party for Peace and Unity, Military University of the Ministry of Defence, Central Military Band, Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Ministry of Interior and Army Academic Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Alexandrov of Russia and military attaches of embassies of different counties in Moscow. 
					
					The charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK in Russia and staff members of the DPRK embassy were present there.
					
					 Prior to the reception its participants placed floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length painting of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They viewed photos on the theme of "Life dedicated to the people" and "The feats of President Kim Il Sung will last forever".
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Marked at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Marked at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A film show and reception took place at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on April 24, a day before the 80th anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there on invitation were the director of the General Political Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army who is member of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China, generals of the General Logistics Department, the General Armament Department of the CPLA and the Political Department of the Air Force of the CPLA, the Chinese People's Armed Police Force and the Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense and military attaches of foreign embassies in Beijing.
					
					 Present there were the DPRK ambassador to China and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 A speech was made there. The participants watched Korean film "Ever-Victorious Ranks of Paraders".
					
					 Then followed a reception.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Marked at DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Marked at DPRK Missions
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was celebrated at DPRK missions abroad.
					 Receptions, remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held between April 6 and 13 at the DPRK missions in the Czech Republic, Poland, Germany, Britain, Italy, Switzerland, Peru, Ethiopia, Democratic Congo, Libya, Equatorial Guinea and South Africa, the DPRK permanent mission at the United Nations and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office in Geneva and its international organizations.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos of their great revolutionary exploits and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films including "For Liberation of the Country", "Arms of the DPRK" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 Present there on invitation were officials of the governments, political parties, parliaments, organizations, institutions, groups for studying the Juche idea and friendship and solidarity organizations, personages of international and regional organizations, non-governmental organizations  and diplomats of various countries.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said Kim Il Sung was a distinguished thinker and theoretician and very modest, unworldly-minded and kind-hearted father of the people, adding that the feats he performed for the Korean revolution and the world socialist movement would last forever.
					
					 The general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy said the progressives deeply respected Kim Il Sung as an outstanding leader of the world socialist movement, adding that the Juche idea founded by him powerfully inspires the people in their struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said he was a good friend who helped the African people in their anti-imperialist national liberation struggle and the efforts to build a new society both materially and morally.

articles.title: People Resentful at S. Korean Regime's Vulgarity
articles.content:
People Resentful at S. Korean Regime's Vulgarity
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- South Korea's traitor Lee Myung Bak and his group termed the celebrations of the Day of the Sun, held to mark President Kim Il Sung's 100th birth anniversary, "extravagant spree" and, worse still, they desecrated the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Such deed has infuriated the people of the DPRK.
					
					 A worker at the Central Zoo, Ju Won Hyok, told KCNA:
					
					 "Rats do only harm to people, and if the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group is left intact, the entire nation would suffer misfortune.
					
					 He is so shameless as to style himself a statesman, though being ridiculed as an underwit. This rat and its clan should be wiped out to the last one."
					
					 Noting he has a talent in catching rats, Ham Kun Sik (71), a man living in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 "I am willing to catch at a breath rattish Lee Myung Bak hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 This is a judgment we ten fellow residents have issued:
					
					 Name: rat Myung Bak
					
					 Zoological name: rat species
					
					 Offense: high treason
					
					 Sentence: to kill by dropping rocks
					
					 This sentence is inappellable and bound to be executed."
					
					 A student at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Ko Sung Gap, said:
					
					 "Traitor Lee reminds one of a rat which appears again before people after scarcely saving its life. Instead of drawing a due lesson from the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, this wicked group of rats dared point an accusing finger at the sky.
					
					 This species should be stamped out at any cost."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Inspires People to Make Innovations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Inspires People to Make Innovations
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's famous work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" has inspired the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to make fresh economic achievements. 
					 Choe Il Ryong, vice-minister of the Light Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 "The work gives a glimpse of the tireless efforts leader Kim Jong Il made for the wellbeing of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the work clearly indicated the way and methods for the development of light industry.
					
					 Under his deep care, a new stride is being made in production of consumer goods.
					
					 I will work hard to make modernly-equipped light industry factories operate at full capacity."
					
					 Ri Nam Jung, department director of the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, said:
					
					 "To better the people's livelihood and improve the nation's economy was a noble desire of Kim Jong Il and it is also the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We will do our best to provide in time raw materials to foodstuff and daily necessities factories so as to ensure their full-capacity operation.
					
					 We will also strive to apply more locally-available raw materials to production.
					
					 We will always take the lead in the drive to carry into practice Kim Jong Un's plan for building an economic power, with transparent revolutionary faith and pure mind."

articles.title: Wax Replica of Kim Jong Suk Displayed
articles.content:
Wax Replica of Kim Jong Suk Displayed
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A hall housing a wax replica of the anti-Japanese war hero, Kim Jong Suk, was opened at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Tuesday.
					 The wax replica of Kim Jong Suk in a guerrilla uniform is standing on an azalea-covered hill against the background of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The hall exhibits the gifts she received from foreign dignitaries and people.
					
					 It serves as another center helping convey down to posterity the revolutionary life and the feats of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of the anti-Japanese guerrilla army who is immortal as a great woman revolutionary. 
					
					 She was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family in Hoeryong, North Hamgyong Province on December 24, Juche 6 (1917).
					
					In her early years, she embarked on the road of revolution and safeguarded President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life, revering him as the sun of the nation.
					
					 She set an example of devotedly defending the leader by thoroughly implementing his ideas and lines.
					
					She distinguished herself in political activities and battles with matchless bravery and superb marksmanship.
					
					 The hall is a precious national treasure, which will be handed down to posterity along with the history of the Sun's Korea.

articles.title: Cartoons Satirizing Rat-like Myung Bak Enjoy Popularity in DPRK
articles.content:
Cartoons Satirizing Rat-like Myung Bak Enjoy Popularity in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Cartoons picturing the killing of rattish Lee Myung Bak of south Korea enjoy great popularity in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 "They are amazing", "This petty rat dared squeak towards the sky" and "They reflect the will of the entire Korean nation" -- This is what local people say after seeing the cartoons.
					
					 The cartoon "Tear rattish Myung Bak to pieces!" portrays the tightly-gripped neck and body of rat-like Myung Bak and his bloody tongue at a last breathing.
					
					 "Beat to death the rattish Myung Bak group of traitors!" and "Wipe out rat-like Myung Bak!" depict a rat being bayoneted.
					
					 "Make clean sweep of the rattish traitors!" shows Lee in flames.
					
					 "Beat rattish Myung Bak to a pulp!" pictures a sharpened axe cutting off Lee's neck and "Look at the wretched face of rattish Myung Bak!" Lee trapped in a rattrap bleeding from the mouth.
					
					 The cartoons also include "Wipe out rattish Myung Bak, a dirt of history!", "Beat to death rattish Myung Bak, a human rubbish and bastard!" and "Death to rattish Myung Bak!"

articles.title: ongs Vibrant with Fighting Spirit
articles.content:
Songs Vibrant with Fighting Spirit
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Songs "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "Arms of Mt. Paektu Will Answer" are ringing out from across the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The songs are vibrant with the will of all servicepersons and civilians to destroy the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats at a breath, once the dear respected Kim Jong Un gives an order of action.
					
					 Singing the songs, the servicepersons and the members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards have taken full combat posture, together with other people.
					
					 Ro Un Dok, a member of the Red Guards, told KCNA that the song "Arms of Mt. Paektu Will Answer" represents his surging anger at the south Korean regime.
					
					 He said:
					
					 "We do never say empty words and our arms know no mercy.
					
					 We will scathingly teach the Lee swarm of rats, which runs amuck like a puppy knowing no fear of the tiger, what a real war is."
					
					 Nam Jin Song, an officer of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, said that there would be no breathing spell in this land and the sky for those hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 "Supreme Commander, please give us your order of action. We will mercilessly punish the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group by force of arms and achieve the national reunification, a long-cherished desire of the Korean nation, by all means."

articles.title: KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak for Letting Loose Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Lee Myung Bak for Letting Loose Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- As a number of world media live-televised, the celebrations for the 100th Day of the Sun in the DPRK have caught broad public interest and evoked worldwide repercussions as grand political festival in the history of the nation and mankind.
					 But the group of rat-like Lee Myung Bak of south Korea only is making squeaking sound, unaware of how the world goes around.
					
					 Hack paper Chosun Ilbo on April 24 egged the rats and riff-raffs of the Information Center for Solidarity with NK Intellectuals on to let loose a spate of vituperation that "turmoil broke out in events held in local areas, generating chaos and claiming casualties."
					
					 Rats can make only squeaking sound.
					
					 Much upset by the storm of cheers raised in the grand festival for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the group of rats dared to do mischief in a senseless bid to reverse the strong trend of the nation and history.
					
					 The coarse invectives let loose by the rats against the DPRK have not stopped even after a notice of the special operation action group of the Supreme Command was issued. This proves that the group of traitors has not yet come to its senses and it is going rampant, deliberately straining the situation, escalating confrontation and making provocations against the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Rat-like traitor Lee Myung Bak, Chosun Ilbo and the group of rats parasitic on the nation should know that the sun in the sky always remains shining.
					
					 This means that the dignity of the supreme leadership of sun's Korea which shines with truth has become the life of the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will not show any mercy to those who dare provoke it. Herein lie the meaning and severity of the stern punishment to be meted out to the provokers.
					
					 The group of rats will soon be made to keenly realize that they will have to die cursing the day they were born.
					
					 The nation and humankind will see what a miserable end the group of rats detrimental to human world meets.

articles.title: Corruption of Lee Myung Bak's Confidant Disclosed
articles.content:
Corruption of Lee Myung Bak's Confidant Disclosed
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS disclosed on April 24 the corruption committed by former Chairman of the Broadcasting and News Service Committee Choe Si Jung, confidant of Lee Myung Bak.
					 Choe's graft has been brought to light when the prosecution was investigating a business.
					
					 In the investigation, a broker was disclosed to have lobbied Choe for an approval for the huge development project in Ryangjae-dong, Seoul in the 2007-2008 period at the request of the representative of the business.
					
					 Those concerned with the development project admitted this and Choe also acknowledged the fact that he was bribed.
					
					 Choe has been involved in lots of corruption cases with the backing of Lee, typically the sale of a foreign exchange bank to an American investment company.
					
					 For this, Choe could not but be ousted from his post in January, judged by the people.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Termed Traitors for All Ages
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Termed Traitors for All Ages
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Officials of Koreans' organizations in Japan separately issued statements on April 23 denouncing the south Korean regime for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and escalating the confrontation with compatriots. They are Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Kang Chu Ryon, chairperson of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Jo Han Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers and School Clerks in Japan, and Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan.
					 At a time when a large number of foreigners came to Pyongyang and celebrated the Day of the Sun, Lee Myung Bak and his group ran the whole gamut of mean and dastardly acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the statements said, and went on: 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is a traitor to the nation with whom it can never live under the same sky.
					
					 Our patience has gone beyond a tolerance limit. The service personnel and people at home are filled with the determination to wipe out the traitors to the last man so that they may not survive to repeat the reckless acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We will hold the legendary great persons of Mt. Paektu in high esteem as the eternal sun and turn out as one in the patriotic sacred war of justice to wipe out the Lee group of traitors and achieve the cause of the country's reunification, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Koreans in China Slam Lee Myung Bak for Hurting Dignity of Leadership
articles.content:
Koreans in China Slam Lee Myung Bak for Hurting Dignity of Leadership
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean Businessmen in China released a statement titled "Let us wipe out Lee Myung Bak group of traitors" on April 21.
					 The statement recalled that the whole world was struck with admiration at the celebrations of the centenary of the birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and they instilled national pride into south Koreans as they witnessed an event of holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the highest posts of the party and state.
					
					 This being a hard fact, south Korea's Lee group of traitors perpetrated the most evil acts of defaming the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The group becoming crazier in its moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots as the days go by reminds one of a rabid dog getting more ferocious before its end. If this group is allowed to be at large, the Korean nation will not be able to escape a nuclear disaster.
					
					 We unequivocally support the firm stand of the DPRK to cut off the windpipes of the group of traitors bent on hideous provocations and their followers and blow up the bases for their provocations so that they may not find any room in this land and sky.
					
					 Only miserable destruction awaits the mean traitors and warmongers kicking off anti-DPRK war hysteria with the backing of the U.S., utterly indifferent to the peace and security of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Registered as Honorary Member of Socialist Party of Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Registered as Honorary Member of Socialist Party of Benin
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of conveying the honorary party membership card to the dear respected Kim Jong Un congratulating him on his election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea took place in Cotonou on April 16.
					 Present there were the participants of the special enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Socialist Party of Benin and the DPRK ambassador to Benin.
					
					 A decision of the special enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Socialist Party of Benin to register Kim Jong Un as honorary member of the party was read out to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 Ali Houdou, chairman of the Socialist Party of Benin, said that it is an event to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean revolution and world history that the Fourth Conference of the WPK decided to invariably hold leader Kim Jong Il, honorary chairman of the Socialist Party of Benin and a great man in defending socialism, in high esteem as general secretary of the WPK forever and elected Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the WPK.
					
					  Korean-style socialism and global independence are sure to emerge victorious and they have a rosy future as long as they are led by Kim Jong Un, he said.
					
					 An honorary party membership card presented to Kim Jong Un was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Benin.

articles.title: Monument to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street in Phnom Penh Re-erected
articles.content:
Monument to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street in Phnom Penh Re-erected
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The re-erected monument to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, was unveiled with due ceremony on April 12. 
					 Present there were officials of the Phnom Penh City Council, the city office and the district where there is the street and citizens.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cambodia and his embassy officials, DPRK officials working in Cambodia.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Phnom Penh City Council was laid before the monument.
					
					 Map Sarin, chairman of the Phnom Penh City Council, said that the citizens of the city are greatly pleased with the successful re-erection of the monument to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street to mark the centenary of his birth. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President maintained close friendly relations with Great King Norodom Sihanouk for a long period and extended full support and encouragement to the Cambodian people in their struggle.
					
					 The great King, always remembering the loving care shown by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, made sure that a street in Phnom Penh was named after Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					 This street is symbolic of the traditional and special friendship between Cambodia and the DPRK.
					
					 We will make efforts to spruce up the street in the future.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Events were held in various countries and by an international organization on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 National meeting, book and photo exhibition and art performance took place in Cuba on April 13, remembrance meetings by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America and in Cambodia and Indonesia, remembrance meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Laos on April 11 and 12.
					
					 On display in the venues were works of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, photos of their immortal feats and books and photos of the Korean people's drive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched Korean film "The Korean People's Army, Steel-strong Ranks".
					
					 Juan Vela Valdes, chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that the shining revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung serve as an example to be followed by the new generation of Cuba.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people displayed popular heroism in the revolutionary wars fought to defeat Japanese and U.S. imperialisms, he added.
					
					 The secretary-general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America said as Kim Il Sung rose as the sun, it was possible for Korea to free itself from the colonial yoke, emerge an independent and sovereign state, humble the arrogance of the U.S. imperialism and firmly protect its sovereignty.
					
					 The president of the Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia said Kim Il Sung was the man whom he revered most deeply, recollecting the efforts made by him to invariably support and encourage the Cambodian people in their struggle to build a new society.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career, Feats Praised by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career, Feats Praised by Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Nepali Paper Arpan carried a special write-up illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The paper on April 6 said in an article titled "Among the People": 
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the Korean revolution to victory for a long period without any single mistake or any slight deviation as far as its line is concerned. Its bottom line was his noble life in which he always mixed himself with people and share destiny with them. 
					
					 Being such a great man, Kim Il Sung could found out such a great idea as the Juche idea and perform great feats on behalf of the country and its people, possessed of most distinguished disposition as a leader.
					
					 He regarded it as an important work and, at the same time, greatest happiness and the most enjoyable rest to go among people. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung is always alive in the hearts of the people as he made journeys to mix himself with people all his life, making a history of victory and glory.
					
					 The paper also carried an article titled "The man who believed in people as in Heaven".
					
					 The paper on April 13 carried an article introducing his sacred revolutionary career and feats under the titles of "The Life of President Kim Il Sung's Was Life of Distinguished Revolutionary and Great Sage" and "Reunification of Korea".

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocation to DPRK Slammed in Peru
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Hideous Provocation to DPRK Slammed in Peru
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on April 20 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for perpetrating again such hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea committed such a grave provocation as hurting again the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in April when the whole world was in a festive mood for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the statement said, and went on:
					
					  President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary career and feats are recognized by the world.
					
					 The whole mankind grandly celebrated the centenary of his birth.
					
					 The Lee group, hordes of vicious reactionaries in the grip of isolation, defamed the celebrations of the 100th Day of the Sun. This was a grave crime as it touched off the resentment of not only the Korean people but of the world progressives and the international community.
					
					 The Lee group of traitors will not be able to escape punishment as it dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in pursuance of permanent division and anti-reunification policy. 
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Peruvian people support the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and the statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations which condemned the Lee group of traitors for its provocations.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Russian paper Pravda Primoriya on April 12 carried the brief biography of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It also carried a portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 80o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvo lugar con exito el dia 25 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					La presencio Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente felicito calurosamente a los espectadores, que celebran el 80o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC, respondiendo a las aclamaciones de ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop,, Kang Sok Ju, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, O Kuk Ryol, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ro Tu Chol, Ri Pyong Sam, Jo Yon Jun, el presidente del partido amigo, los cuadros del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los funcionarios las ramas de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y los soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea.
					
					Fueron invitados las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en ultramar, los compatriotas, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los delegados diplomaticos, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los demas huespedes extranjeros, acreditados en Corea.
					
					En la escena, iniciada con el coro del Himno Nacional, se presentaron el coro masculino "Marcha del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el coro masculino "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung", el duo mixto "Mi patria que defiendo", los coros masculinos en serie "La patria madre nos llama" y "Desfile militar de victoria", el coro masculino "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron en el espectaculo las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y el Generalisimo       Kim Jong Il quienes prepararon el gran poderio militar que garantiza la prosperidad del pais y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Maximo Dirigente les felicito a los ejecutantes por la exitosa funcion volvieron a resonar los vitores al Maximo Dirigente quien reciproco el saludo a los ejecutantes y espectadores y les.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion, expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas del coro estimularan activamente al ejercito y al pueblo de la RPDC a la marcha orgullosa hacia el triunfo final mediante sus actividades artisticas revolucionarias y combativas.

articles.title: Inaugurada Carniceria Mansugyo
articles.content:
Inaugurada Carniceria Mansugyo
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Se ha construido a la ribera del pintoresco rio Pothong, que bana esta capital, la Carniceria Mansugyo.
					Esta tienda de tres pisos ocupa una superficie arquitectonica de mas de 5 mil metros cuadrados. 
					
					En el primer piso se venden los pescados frescos, congelados y procesados y en el segundo, las carnes de res, puerco, ganso, pavo, codorniz, etc. y los productos procesados. 
					
					En la tercera planta esta acondicionado un restaurante que oferta la carne asada y otros platos. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 25 la ceremonia de inauguracion. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un visito la carniceria para felicitar la inauguracion. 
					
					Le acogieron en la tienda Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito. 
					
					Recorriendo el interno de la carniceria,          Kim Jong Un se mostro muy satisfecho de que los constructores militares hayan hecho muchos favores al pueblo.
					
					Dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se habria sentido feliz, si hubiera visto esa tienda dotada de maximo nivel de servicio.
					
					Kim Jong Un indico las tareas importantes que se presentan en la administracion de la tienda. 
					
					En enero pasado, el habia visitado el campo de construccion de la carniceria.  
					
					En esa ocasion, enseno el rumbo y remedios para culminar la construccion destacando que la carniceria debe ser construida en el principio de facilitar al maximo el confort de los compradores que la frecuentarian con gusto.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con constructores militares del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con constructores militares del EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea tomo foto de recuerdo junto con los constructores militares quienes con motivo del centenario de  natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, levantaron magnificamente el Pabellon de Armamentos del EPC como gran creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.
					 Kim Jong Un envio el cordial saludo a las aclamaciones de los constructores llenos de emocion.
					
					Tras felicitar calurosamente a los constructores militares el Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Evaluo de alto los meritos de ellos que con motivo del centenario de natalicio del Presidente construyo magnificamente como regalo dirigido al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, de manera que glorificaron mas las imborrables hazanas revolucionarias del Songun de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu e infundieron profundamente en el alma de los oficiales y los soldados del EPC  y el pueblo la historia de fusil del PTC, contribuyendo asi grandemente a estimular a ellos a la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Expreso el deseo y la conviccion de que los constructores militares hagan aporte activo a la realizacion de la causa de la construccion de un Estado socialista dando prueba sin reserva de la abnegacion patriotica y el heroismo masivo en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del partido e instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, Ju Kyu Chang, Kim Chang Sop, Ri Pyong Sam, Choe Pu Il, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Kim Su Hak y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Publica comunicado conjunto en reunion de representantes de APRP
articles.content:
Publica comunicado conjunto en reunion de representantes de APRP
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- La reunion de representantes de las direcciones nortena, surena y ultramarina de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hizo publica el dia 25 el siguiente comunicado conjunto: 
					Tuvo lugar el dia 25 en Pyongyang la reunion de representantes del Norte, el Sur y el Ultramar de la APRP.
					
					Participaron el presidente de la direccion nortena, Choe Jin Su, el presidente interino de la surena, Ro Su Hui, y el presidente de la ultramarina, Rim Min Sik. 
					
					El foro convocado en medio de la situacion interna y externa muy complicada y aguda enfatizo unanimemente que la unica via por lograr la paz y la reunificacion independiente del pais es mantener y ejecutar cabalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Manifesto la ferrea voluntad de la APRP de tomar delantera en ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, consolidar la solidaridad tripartita y elevar decisivamente la autoridad de la APRP mediante la practica iniciativa y activa por la reunificacion independiente. 
					
					 E insistio en la necesidad de fortalecer la solidaridad con el Comite Conjunto Nacional para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y distintos estratos dentro y fuera del pais, impulsar energicamente el movimiento pannacional por ejecutarla y sentenciar este ano con el poderio de la unidad a las fuerzas conservadoras anti-reunificacion para que continue la corriente de la era del 15 de Junio. 
					
					 Y se refirio a la necesidad de librar con dinamismo la lucha por eliminar la "ley de seguridad", las "medidas del 24 de mayo" y otros obstaculos que frenan la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales, poner en libertad a las personalidades pro-reunificacion encarceladas injustamente en el Sur de Corea y lograr la libertad de las discusiones y las actividades por la reunificacion. 
					
					Los representantes de la parte norte y la ultramarina reafirmaron la firme posicion de dinamizar las actividades de apoyo a la direccion surena que lucha en la delantera por frustrar la campana de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion para aplastar la direccion surena y por lograr la independencia, la paz y la gran unidad de la nacion. 
					
					En particular, los participantes denunciaron fuertemente las brutales provocaciones de las fuerzas conservadoras de Lee Myung Bak que llevan la situacion al limite de guerra insultando gravemente la maxima dignidad y el sistema de la parte connacional y llamaron ardientemente a todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais a la lucha pannacional contra ellas. 
					
					Por ultimo, manifestaron la firme voluntad y decision de la APRP de cumplir el papel vanguardista en superar las dificultades de hoy, defender la seguridad de la nacion y abrir la brecha decisiva de la reunificacion independiente.
